entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Cold Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -16.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Cold Lake 04:29 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -16.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -18.0°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Fog becoming fog patches near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Fog. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
